review: The rubber wrapped around the part that goes in the cup holder is too wide for the cup holders in my new recliners, and too small for the cup holders in my car.  It would be a solid 5 Star product if it had an adjustable base like http://www.amazon.com/ChargerCity-Universal-Vehicle-3-5-Inch-Adjustable/dp/B00CTZF8G0?ie=UTF8&redirect=true&ref_=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_5.
productTitle: Evelots Automobile Swivel Tray Car Truck Food Snacks Electronics Cup Holder
